00026 //----------------------------------------------------------
00027 GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet( const GrCamera& camera, unsigned int segmentCount, float firstSize )
00028 : _segments( new SSegment[ segmentCount ] )
00029 , _segmentCount( segmentCount )
00030 , _frustum( camera.GetFrustum() )
00031 {
00033         const GrFrustum& frustum = camera.GetFrustum();
00034         const MVec3& cameraPos = camera.GetPos();
00035         MVec3 lookVec = camera.GetLookDir();
00036 
00038         MVec3 cornerVectors[ 4 ];
00039 
00041         cornerVectors[ 0 ] = frustum.GetFarBottomLeft() - frustum.GetNearBottomLeft();
00042         cornerVectors[ 0 ] *= 1.0f / cornerVectors[ 0 ].Dot( lookVec );
00043 
00045         cornerVectors[ 1 ] = frustum.GetFarTopLeft() - frustum.GetNearTopLeft();
00046         cornerVectors[ 1 ] *= 1.0f / cornerVectors[ 1 ].Dot( lookVec );
00047 
00049         cornerVectors[ 2 ] = frustum.GetFarTopRight() - frustum.GetNearTopRight();
00050         cornerVectors[ 2 ] *= 1.0f / cornerVectors[ 2 ].Dot( lookVec );
00051 
00053         cornerVectors[ 3 ] = frustum.GetFarBottomRight() - frustum.GetNearBottomRight();
00054         cornerVectors[ 3 ] *= 1.0f / cornerVectors[ 3 ].Dot( lookVec );
00055 
00057         float length = firstSize;
00058         float start = 0.0f;
00059         float lengthMul = 1.0f / Tan( 0.5f * camera.GetProj().GetFOV() );
00060         unsigned int lastSegment = segmentCount - 1;
00061         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < segmentCount; ++i )
00062         {
00064                 if ( i == lastSegment )
00065                         length = 500.0f;
00066 
00068                 float end = start + length;
00069                 unsigned int s = 0;
00070                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 4; ++j )
00071                 {
00072                         _segments[ i ].corners[ j+0 ] = cameraPos + start * cornerVectors[ j ];
00073                         _segments[ i ].corners[ j+4 ] = cameraPos + end * cornerVectors[ j ];
00074                 }
00075 
00077                 _segments[ i ].start = start;
00078                 _segments[ i ].end = end;
00079 
00081                 start += length;
00082                 length *= lengthMul;
00083         }
00084 }
00085 
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::~GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet()
00088 {
00089         delete[] _segments;
00090 }

00097 //----------------------------------------------------------
00098 void
00099 GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::UpdateSegments( const GrCamera& faceCamera, float border, float distBias )
00100 {
00101         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < _segmentCount; ++i )
00102         {
00103                 SSegment& curSegment = _segments[ i ];
00104 
00106                 const GrFrustum& faceFrustum = faceCamera.GetFrustum();
00107                 curSegment.visible = IsSegmentVisible( curSegment, faceFrustum );
00108 
00110                 if ( !curSegment.visible )
00111                         continue;
00112 
00114                 const MMat4x4& worldToViewMat = faceCamera.GetViewMatrix();
00115                 const MMat4x4& viewToProjMat = faceCamera.GetProjMatrix();
00116 
00118                 MVec3 curPos;
00119                 float maxZ = -1.0f;
00120                 MVec3 minExts( FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX, FLT_MAX );
00121                 MVec3 maxExts( -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX, -FLT_MAX );
00122                 for ( unsigned int j = 0; j < 8; ++j )
00123                 {
00127                         curPos = curSegment.corners[ j ];
00128                         worldToViewMat.TransformCoordNoPerspFast( curPos );
00129 
00131                         minExts.SetX( Min( minExts.GetX(), curPos.GetX() ) );
00132                         minExts.SetY( Min( minExts.GetY(), curPos.GetY() ) );
00133                         minExts.SetZ( Min( minExts.GetZ(), curPos.GetZ() ) );
00134                         maxExts.SetX( Max( maxExts.GetX(), curPos.GetX() ) );
00135                         maxExts.SetY( Max( maxExts.GetY(), curPos.GetY() ) );
00136                         maxExts.SetZ( Max( maxExts.GetZ(), curPos.GetZ() ) );
00137                 }
00138 
00142                 if ( minExts.GetZ() > 0.0f )
00143                 {
00146                         curSegment.visible = false;
00147                         continue;
00148                 }
00149 
00151 #if 1
00152                 if ( !faceCamera.GetProj().IsOrtho() && minExts.GetZ() < 0.0f && maxExts.GetZ() > faceCamera.GetProj().GetNearClip().GetD() )
00153                 {
00155                         curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x = -1.0f;
00156                         curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y = -1.0f;
00157                         curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x = 1.0f;
00158                         curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y = 1.0f;
00159                         curSegment.aaBox.clipLogX = 0;
00160                         curSegment.aaBox.clipLogY = 0;
00161                         curSegment.aaBox.z = viewToProjMat.TransformCoord( minExts ).GetZ();    
00162                         return;
00163                 }
00164 #endif
00165 
00169                 if ( !faceCamera.GetProj().IsOrtho() && _frustum.IsPointInside( faceFrustum.GetPos() ) )
00170                 {
00172                         float dist = _frustum.GetCullPlane( GrFrustum::ECP_NEAR ).Dist( faceFrustum.GetPos() );
00173                         if ( dist >= curSegment.start && dist <= curSegment.end )
00174                         {
00176                                 curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x = -1.0f;
00177                                 curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y = -1.0f;
00178                                 curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x = 1.0f;
00179                                 curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y = 1.0f;
00180                                 curSegment.aaBox.clipLogX = 0;
00181                                 curSegment.aaBox.clipLogY = 0;
00182                                 curSegment.aaBox.z = viewToProjMat.TransformCoord( minExts ).GetZ();    
00183                                 return;
00184                         }
00185                 }
00186 
00188                 MVec3 nearBottomLeft(   minExts.GetX(), minExts.GetY(), maxExts.GetZ()  );
00189                 MVec3 nearTopRight(             maxExts.GetX(), maxExts.GetY(), maxExts.GetZ()  );
00190                 MVec3 farBottomLeft(    minExts.GetX(), minExts.GetY(), minExts.GetZ()  );
00191                 MVec3 farTopRight(              maxExts.GetX(), maxExts.GetY(), minExts.GetZ()  );
00192 
00195                 viewToProjMat.TransformCoordFast( nearBottomLeft );
00196                 viewToProjMat.TransformCoordFast( nearTopRight );
00197                 viewToProjMat.TransformCoordFast( farBottomLeft );
00198                 viewToProjMat.TransformCoordFast( farTopRight );
00199 
00201                 curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x = Min( nearBottomLeft.GetX(), farBottomLeft.GetX() );
00202                 curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y = Min( nearBottomLeft.GetY(), farBottomLeft.GetY() );
00203                 curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x = Max( nearTopRight.GetX(), farTopRight.GetX() );
00204                 curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y = Max( nearTopRight.GetY(), farTopRight.GetY() );
00205                 curSegment.aaBox.z = nearBottomLeft.GetZ();
00206 
00208                 SVec2 preClipLowerLeft = curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft;
00209                 SVec2 preClipUpperRight = curSegment.aaBox.upperRight;
00210 
00212                 curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x = Max( curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x, -1.0f );
00213                 curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y = Max( curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y, -1.0f );
00214                 curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x = Min( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x, 1.0f );
00215                 curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y = Min( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y, 1.0f );
00216 
00219 #if 0
00223 
00228 
00229                 float clipLeft = Max( curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x - preClipLowerLeft.x, 0.0f );
00230                 float clipRight = Max( preClipUpperRight.x - curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x, 0.0f );
00231                 float clipBottom = Max( curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y - preClipLowerLeft.y, 0.0f );
00232                 float clipTop = Max( preClipUpperRight.y - curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y, 0.0f );
00233 
00234                 curSegment.aaBox.clipLogX = ( int )( Log2( 0.5f * ( clipLeft + clipRight ) + 1.0f ) );
00235                 curSegment.aaBox.clipLogY = ( int )( Log2( 0.5f * ( clipBottom + clipTop ) + 1.0f ) );
00236 #else
00237                 curSegment.aaBox.clipLogX = 0;
00238                 curSegment.aaBox.clipLogY = 0;
00239 #endif
00240 
00241                 float curWidth = curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x - curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x;
00242                 float curHeight = curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y - curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y;
00243                 if ( curWidth < kMinAABoxDim )
00244                 {
00245                         float avg = 0.5f * ( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x + curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x );
00246                         curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x = avg + kMinAABoxDim;
00247                         curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x = avg - kMinAABoxDim;
00248                 }
00249                 if ( curHeight < kMinAABoxDim )
00250                 {
00251                         float avg = 0.5f * ( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y + curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y );
00252                         curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y = avg + kMinAABoxDim;
00253                         curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y = avg - kMinAABoxDim;
00254                 }
00255 
00257                 float borderX = ( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x - curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x ) * border + distBias;
00258                 float borderY = ( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y - curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y ) * border + distBias;
00259 
00261                 if ( curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x < 1.0f )
00262                         curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.x -= borderX;
00263                 if ( curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y < 1.0f )
00264                         curSegment.aaBox.lowerLeft.y -= borderY;
00265                 if ( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x > -1.0f )
00266                         curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.x += borderX;
00267                 if ( curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y > -1.0f )
00268                         curSegment.aaBox.upperRight.y += borderY;
00269         }
00270 }

00272 //----------------------------------------------------------
00273 const GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::SAABox2D&
00274 GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::GetSegmentAABox( unsigned int segment ) const
00275 {
00276         B_ASSERT( segment < _segmentCount );
00277         return _segments[ segment ].aaBox;
00278 }

00280 //----------------------------------------------------------
00281 bool
00282 GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::IsSegmentVisible( unsigned int segment ) const
00283 {
00284         B_ASSERT( segment < _segmentCount );
00285         return _segments[ segment ].visible;
00286 }

00291 //==========================================================
00292 
00293 //----------------------------------------------------------
00294 bool
00295 GrVirtualShadowSegmentSet::IsSegmentVisible( const SSegment& segment, const GrFrustum& frustum )
00296 {
00298         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < 6; ++i )
00299         {
00301                 const MPlane& curPlane = frustum.GetCullPlane( ( GrFrustum::ECULLPLANE )i );
00302 
00305                 unsigned int j = 0;
00306                 for ( ; j < 8; ++j )
00307                 {
00310                         if ( curPlane.GetSide( segment.corners[ j ], GR_GENERIC_DISTANCE_EPSILON ) >= 0 )
00311                                 break;
00312                 }
00313 
00316                 if ( j == 8 )
00317                         return false;
00318         }
00319 
00321         return true;
00322 }
